name: Obverse
description:
Obverse was created for the game jam 1 bit weekend.

I was restricted to only having two colors on the screen at once and creating a game around the theme reflections.

The restriction led to a very interesting artistic direction and an interesting central mechanic as well.

Tutorial:

A and D to move

W to jump

Shift/Space to reflect

You cannot reflect if there isn't enough space

If you have feedback please leave it in the comments and follow me.

If you'd like to support me externally follow me on Twitch at twitch.tv/Gravity_Fizz
